header.title: phpBB Gallery - recent & random images
header.description: Adds recent & random images to index.php
header.author-notes: i hope you get it installed, otherwise you can ask for help on phpbb.de and phpbb.com

edit.find: /** * rows numeric default 1, * columns numeric default 4, * display array, * modes string(recent|random|both), */ recent_gallery_images(1, 4, $display, 'both');
edit.action: /** * rows numeric default 1, * columns numeric default 4, * display array, * modes string(recent|random|comment|!recent|!random|!comment|all), Exp: '!recent' means random + comment */ recent_gallery_images(1, 4, $display, 'all');
